channel.title: egyptians on Joel's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in egyptians on Joel's Diary

item.title: Egyptians
item.description: The Nile is an Egyptian river. The river Nile is where they get there crops from. The onions were their God food. There regular food was beer and bread. The Egyptian Sun God is called Ra. The ancient Egyptians believed in the after life. Tutankhamen’s tomb was found in 1920. Tutankhamen is the most known Egyptian pharaoh in the world. He died at the age of 19. He had a dagger made from a meteor Iron.
